column9: Nice meal at centre of Lund
column11: Come here for the lunch based on recommendation of a friend. Food is quite nice. Got their lunch menu of the day. Is nice and reasonable price. The decor of the place is very nice. Toilet also equip with baby pampers.... a bit suprise...

Cooked with care and top produce!
Delicious. We had lunch; somewhat pricy but worth it! Don't miss mango sticky rice for desert!

column9: Great spot for dinner in Lund
column11: We shared the chicken skewers and some summer rolls. The rolls were so good we ordered a second plate before our meal. I had the baby back ribs as recommended by our server. They were delicious. I wasnâ€™t expecting to find them in Sweden.

column9: Nice surprise with excellent Asian food

A very good place for Asian-European fusion food. Reasonable prices and very nice and helpful staff. Recommended.

column9: A tropical summer evening in Lund, framed the Asian meal perfect
column11: Even the temperature in the charming restaurant made you belief that we were in other latitudes. So liberating to eat at an Asian who is not over decorated with imported decorations.Lovely selection of tasty first courses, some own interpretations but still in its authentic flavor...More

Nicely furnished restaurant close to the main station. Came here because of the good reviews for a lunch. Small but delicious lunch menu. Very friendly and efficient service. No problem to bring in the baby stroller with our five month old son.

column9: Very tasty restaurant in the center of Lund

Wonderful food with fantastc taste. Very kind and helpful service. The starters were very tasty and good. Sauce with chili taste. We had prosecco with the food and it  balanced vey well. Must eat type of restarant if you like asian food.
This is a very good option for dinner or lunch in lund. The food is delicious and the venue itself is cosy. Service was impeccable. Highly recommended.

They usually have 3 different choices on their lunch menu which changes regularly.  A fish/prawn, beef and Vegetarian option....More
Fusion Thai at its best. I donâ€™t have negative to say about this restaurant. Slightly on the pricey side but portions are huge and tasty! Worth a visit.

A thai/asian restaurant conventiently located in central Lund. Excellent food, everyone in my company were satisified with their meal beyond doubt. Genuine taste, for those of you have eaten real thai food will appreciate the flashback.

Fantastic fusion food. High quality ingredience, inspired recepies and excellent service. All of this for reasonable prices. A rarity and gem in Sweden. Highly recommended.

Thai mixed with European cuisine, fresh ingredients, well balanced and innovative tastes to reasonable prices. Perfect service and delicious desserts to top things of. Right at the top of my future choices. Thanks

Had the Tom yum oxtail soup & sticky ribs & chicken panang curry with cider 
Food was super delicious and service was excellent ! Generous portion sizes .. by far our best meal in Lund .

Yummy food with fresh, carefully crafted ingredients. Prices are fair and the staff is attentive and kind.
I had amazing dinner with my family last year. The service and tasted were both fabulous! Since then I go there even I am alone :) Can't forget the rib with peanut miso sauce.

One of, if not the best restaurant of its kind in Lund. Delicate, Asien-inspired food, good service, very priceworthy. The meny is kept relatively short but there is something for everybody.

Fantastic thai food and good service! A family business at it's best. You would want to return over and over again.

column9: Exciting mix between Asian and Swedish food
column11: Very nice atmosphere. Good and friendly  service and excellent food, that mixes Asian  and European cooking. The lokation in an old house in central Lund, on a quiet street between the Central  station, the University building and the Cathedral, is excellent.
Very nice place with a plaseant backyard. Good food and non-alcoholic beverages is very interesting. Ice cream is a must- to- taste.

column9: Great lunch with good flavours a reasonable price
column11: We had a great lunch with family. There were four alternatives to choose (fish, pork, chicken and vegetarian). Very friendly service and good cosy atmosphere. If you like Asian food this is a place to visit.

column9: Delicious Thai food and pleasant surroundings

column9: So so so so so good

column9: Best Thai food outside of Thailand
column11: Everything here gets 5 stars ... the staff and host where welcoming, friendly and obviously passionate about the food. The restaurant itself has a cosy, cheerful ambiance and there is a very pretty terrace with nice flower boxes if it's warm enough to sit outide....More

Very pleasant staff, nice small inner garden. A small amount of dishes on the menu but interesting. We chose starter svala sommarrullar and they were very good and fresh. Main dish:spicy southern ribs  were really spicy, grillad oxfile med grÃ¶n curry sÃ¥s - the sauce...More

Iâ€™ve been to this restaurant plenty of times and the food has never let me down!!! My favorite dish is the ribs!!! Itâ€™s absolutely fabulous and the staff that works there are very friendly! Iâ€™ve been there with friends and family and the kids liked...More

What a gem on a warm spring evening! With it being unusually warm in Lund we went looking for somewhere to eat outside - a bit optimistic for a last minute choice on a Friday night and most places were booked. But we were really...More

I was not disappointed with our visit. Delicious food, good servings and cozy for a lunch celebration ğŸ¾ 
The waitress was able to recommend from the menu and made sure we had a good time.

I thought we would receive tiny portions of food in large plates, but Ihsiri proved me wrong. 
We have received great service, got all our questions answered patiently and sincerely.
If you want to have a taste of Thai food without Swedish influence, try this...More

Ihsiri was so good that I ate both lunch and dinner here the same day! A choosy ambience, attentive service and really nice Asian inspired food.
Recommended!

My husband and I decided to try this restaurant and were not disappointed, in spite of walking there on a rainy evening!  The baby-back ribs, rice and slaw were wonderful as well as their Mango-Tango Dessert, one of their specialties.

I had lunch here with a friend, and everything was just lovely! Excellent value for money, definitely recommend. The food was so good we ended up having lunch there the day after, too! Also, the terrace is nice and the service impeccable.

Was here at dinner. Place is nice, reminds me of a home-style restaurant. Starter soup was awesome. Smooth and creamy. Main course the lobster was a bit dry, But excellent noodles compensated this. Waitress, young Lady with glasses was very helpful and made us a...More

This restaurant is an excellent and indeed even a necessary choice for any visitor to Lund. Asian fusion, heavily Thai but with some Japanese influence as well, not necessarily what one might expect but it is very very good. This is a very popular spot...More

Arrived without a booking at 1830 on a Wednesday.  Welcomed and sat immediately in the conservatory area.  Good service, and good tasty food (spicy ribs and Pad Thai).  An enjoyable meal, well recommended.

This was our third visit at Ihsiri and the food was just as delicious as previously. We were here to celebrate our marriage anniversary and decided to have a bottle of prosecco. We had expected to get a wine cooler for the bottle, but the...More
Restaurant has a lovely style, friendly staff and great food. Perfect for business as well as private dinners. If you are in Lund, you should definitely go there

The food was very delicious, not to much to choose from which I think it is good. It seems like the put a lot of effort to make the dishes they have very good. The waiter was very nice, he presented the food and did...More

It is a very cosy place centrally located. It is an old house and they have kept end some old elements like the fireplaces. 
The menu is not long but it has all the options - fish, meat, veggie. 
Mango tango is a must at...More

column9: One of the best in Lund
column11:
We go there frequently with my friends for lunch and sometimes for dinner, itâ€™s our favorite Asian restaurant in Lund for the following reasons: 
1. Food is great and the flavours are cleverly created , with a very beautiful presentation. 
2. Over the top friendly...More
Amazing Thai food in the centre of Lund. Thai food with a twist of high class preparation - not an everyday combination.

This place is so good I'm quite hesitant to give it a review here, because that will mean that more people find this place! 
Went here to have a glass of wine with a colleague and to check out the Place after renovations and change...More
This place is well worth a visit when in Lund. The Thai inspired food is delicious and the athmosphere is very much influenced by students. Very good service and not expensive.

Excellent food in a not-so-fancy restaurant. Ihsiri serves a rather limited menu, but the dishes are delicious. It's not too pricey for what they serve and it's a very good place to go out to for a dinner with friends. The restaurant has a pleasant...More

We ate in their winter conservatory (udestue) while it rained outside, and it was so cozy. The food was irresistible. Great presentation and flavor. My pad thai with chicken was delicious and my husband's red curry was to die for. 

I loved the fact that...More

Lovely Thai food with diverse flavourings presented in a classic Swedish setting. The use of banana leaves, flowers and baskets gave the dishes an aesthetic impact as your taste buds enjoyed a wide range of dipping sauces, marinades and textures. The tofu skewers, salmon and...More

I have reached Ihsiri with a colleague of mine without booking. The place is nice in one of the narrow streets in the city center. Nice quality of the offered food. Kind staff. Price/quality ratio very very good

Very nice, and different from the usual thai restaurants in scandinavia (also a little pricier). Properly spicy and combined with local ingredients, so not traditional thai either. I had the spicy ribs, look forward to try some of the other dishes on their menu some...More

Great little restaurant. We shared several dishes including the papaya salad, rib mix, the green curry dish and one of the vegetarian dishes. Their sauces were very flavorful, with spices true to Thai cuisine. The staff were very friendly. I would love to eat here...More
The cuisine is Thai but the emphasis is also on fresh ingredients exquisitely prepared. The service is pleasant and attentive without being overbearing.
We had baby and spicy ribs as main dish. They were okay but nothing special. Consider visiting other places if you are thai cousine fan. No Wifi was available.

column9: Delicious food for all of us
column11: We got a recommendation from to go here from the reception in our hotel in Lund, and to say the least we where not disappointed, the restaurant was in center of town and it was quite full when we get there, but then they had...More

Had read the reviews and heard recommendations... unfortunately they did not meet expectations.  Tried to come in first time without a booking. Second time we did fix the booking but was disappointed. Was surprised that a tortilla wrap was served for lunch on a Thai/Asia...More

column9: Very good Thai restaurant that also has a large selection of vegan alterantives
column11: This was a surprisingly nice Thai restaurant. I had their Pad Thai with king prawns and it was delicious. They also have a nice selection of beers. The atmosphere is nice and the staff is very friendly and service-minded. I had ice cream for dessert...More
The lunch was quite good. I had a garlic burger which had a little Thai touch to it. Environment is nice and really central. It's bit pricey though compared to what you get.

In Scandinavia, Thai has become the new Chinese. This also means that many Thai restaurants serve OK, but boring food. Not so here. This is special, and worth every kroner you spend there! Good selection of beers, too.

This restaurant is surprisingly good. We tried a variety of dishes and found that it was all either very good or excellent. Highly recommend if you like Asian or just enjoy a good meal. Very nice and friendly staff too made this an enjoyable experience.
My family and I enjoyed a really good dinner! The best asian food I have eaten since I don't know when! Great service and ambiance! Looking forward to come back again. :)

I was out with my girlfriends and we had a really good time. Nice wine, friendly service and delicious food. We had the summer rolls, always nice, and I had the steamed fish (sea-bass I think), and it was splendidly cooked.
Hade lunch this week. The food was great and the price is nice. Good service also. Can recommend the place.

I love the spring rolls, chicken and spicy ribs here!  To eat here is a little bit expensive but it worths. Service is nice and you can pay your own part which is really convenient.

We ended up here since close to the hotel.
Staff speaks english very well. All plates are asian or have asian influence.
I had duck with asian influence and was very tasteful. 
Big beer choice. Limited wines.

I have visit this restaurant on several occasions and have always got very tasty and well prepared dishes. I can highly recommend a visit to Ihsiri if you are looking for a lovely Thai food served in a typical Scandinavian environment.
We were four of us that dined this evening and all of us was very satisfied with the food and friendly service. Every plate served was nicely set and tasted superb.

We picked this restaurant randomly, simply running a cross-check with TA to ensure the reviews were decent enough. And gosh, what a nice dinner we had!!! Everything from the springrolls we shared for starters to the service were immaculate. We had a variety of mains,...More

We had lunch at this place. A lunch dish consisting of duck in red curry and tofu in green curry with pineapple. Super friendly staff, nice and really tasty food with a real Thai flavor. Nice lemonades and ciders they have.

Went here on the spur of the moment, and was not disappointed.  Very friendly and welcoming staff, nice surroundings (and warm).  They have a relatively short but very interesting menu, Thai/Swedish fusion. I had a superb salmon dish, wrapped in banana leaf with a fresh...More

column9: Very good food and excellent service
column11:
This restaurant offers delicious Thai food, extremely well presented and prepared with care. The staff was friendly and nice; even if we came a little later (around 8:30 pm), we were received with a smile. 
We enjoyed a great dinner in this lovely place, and...More

column9: Best and tastiest meal in Lund

It's not often that a visit to a restaurant surprises you. Most of the time you, can at least, guess what you will get. Ihsiri is not one of those.
They will serve you something that is much better than what you expected, even if...More

Delicious Thai food, perfectly prepared and beautifully presented! Dinner service here is wonderful, and if you're looking for somewhere to go for a business lunch, this is a great place to have a meal that's a cut above a regular lunch.

Met a friend for a nice Monday-Night Dinner to enjoy and talk. The food was extremely good (both had veg option) and the guys working there were very helpful. 
One point deduction for very noisy environment due to the interior. 
Nevertheless I will come back...More

Amazing food, friendly staff and relaxed atmosphere makes this my absolute...More

I have been here a few times and always had a really good dinner. In my view they are serving a more sophisticated version of the Thai cuisine than anybody in this neck of the woods. No easy wins using chili galore but instead surprisingly...More

Nice attitude of sympathetic staff. Clearly the number of dishes and a moderately large range of beverages. Everyone in my company did experience a small taste of sensation. Not to compare with the Thai-inspired restaurants that we have visit before. Good food at acceptable price....More
Had a very tasty vegetarian dish there last Saturday at lunch time. Perfect food and very good service.

The finest dining in Lund, to a good price! Every time I go there I get surprised by the beautiful and tasty food. The service and the surrounding is also perfect. I would reccomend this place for any occation.

column9: Very nice new restaurant experience in Lund
column11:
By chance we ended up in Ishiri to celebrate our youngest daughters new job. Great service and really tasty dishes. We all had the ribs. The entrecÃ´te starter was very good. 
Nice sparkling wine as a starter and a chocolate cake for me to finish...More
Great elevated fresh new thai food with a twist and really nice people working there. You have to try the entrecÃ´te starter!
Nice athmosphere and very friendly and personal staff! The duck was amazing! I will most definitely be back!

column9: Asian Fusion - great taste but at a price
column11: I can only speak for the vegetarian dish, but it was very fresh and tasty, with an appealing plating. The only downside it was the price - a bit spicy, but overall worth it.
Good lunch and nice service, but i do not know why this place scores so high. The tofu was kind of dull and the mango-rice dessert more interesting than good.
Nice and different food. Nice staff. Worth a visit if you are in Lund. Nice space. You maybe need to book a table to be sure to have a place.

column9: Delicious food in a cozy athmosphere
column11:
We went to ihsiri to celebrate 4 years as boyfriend/girlfriend. We called the same day and they managed to squeeze us in at a late hour. 

The service was excellent with attentive staff. I also have to say that their locale is really cozy at...More
We went there after looking for food for 45mins. The dishes there were super tasty. I had the cauliflower rice and the cod loin. Could not recommend enough this place.

Big menu for such a little place. We shared two starters and four mains. Each dish was distinct and delicious. The space is divided so that you almost feel like you are in a private room. Friendly and relaxed service. Good beer menu and wine...More

column9: Best asian cuisine in MalmÃ¶/Lund area
column11:
I consider myself a rather difficult to please customer when dining out, especially when visiting restaurants in this price range (16-25 â‚¬ main course) but I keep coming back to Ihsiri time and time again.

The starters (6-12 â‚¬) are flavorful and wonderful compositions well...More

This is my second visit and both times have been very, very good! Its easily one of the best restaurants in the entire region! If you're in town and even just slightly enjoy Thai food you need to eat here! Very imaginative, tasty dishes that...More

If you are in Lund and looking for a good lunch place with tasty food, Ihsiri would be definitely recommended.  For 125 SEK (14 USD), a bowl of tasty and crispy skinned salmon was served.  The combination of this teriyaki inspired dish with the rice...More
We had lunch here. Prime location in Lund. The food was ok, but I was not so impressed, maybe because I am actually not a big fan of Thai food. However, the deco inside the restaurant was nice.

column9: Incredible Thai food in the heart of Lund
column11: I found this place while traveling to Lund for work and it was some of the best Thai food that I have had. It was a lovely night so I was able to sit in the garden. I ordered the summer rolls with prawns, half...More

column9: Nice starters, good wine, great location
column11: Stopped by during a warm day and had a nice glass of wine on a terrace - nice summer and vegetarian roles, great service
Delicious, tasty and fresh food in a charming old building with a cosy and rustic interior. Attentive and friendly staff. Thank you for a wonderful and memorable meal!
If you want to have excelent asian food when visiting Lund ISHIRI is the place. Both owners and staff Will guide you and take excelent care of you.

column9: Good food and new take on Thai classic
column11: This is a bit pricey by normal thai restaurant standards, but the lunch prices are reasonable. The food is good and can change your mind about the typically thai food offered in Sweden. The seasoning tends to cater still to the Swedish tastebuds of being...More
Had 70 minutes before a show. They delivered great service, great food and a very good price. It was a very nice experience.

column9: awesome ambience with an eclectic menu

Golden Star for food, setting, location, service, all staffs! What a lovely restaurant! Best in Lund!

I loved the rice and the ribs which seemed to melt effortlessly with every bite. The sauce was also amazing. Very nice service... definitely visiting again. You might consider making a reservation in advance.

Excellent dinner!  We arrived after a last-minute decision to see if we could get a table - it was a lovely night, and the owner was able to set us up outside.  Great food, excellent drink selection and suberb service from the owner himself -...More

Amazing food and nice atmosphere, friendly staff. We will definitely come back and have those zucchini noodles again, can't get them put of our minds!
Absolutely worth it!

We had a group dinner where all the food was brought out at once.  I suspect this was not the best presentation of the food, but I found it all to be very good.  We were able to try a wide selection of dishes at...More
Perfect food, very good service. Highly recomended! I wish I had this level restaurant in my home town..

Ihsiri is a great place serving modern Asian food. It's a cosy place with friendly staff. 
I had the baby back ribs served with rice and a side of sesame coleslaw, which I can definitely reccommend. There were so many other yummy sounding dishes, so...More

Relatively small and well furnished restaurant close to the main station. Thai, or rather  Asian mixed menu of high quality. Good service but prices are a bit higher than average or expected. Nice as a change of food with good taste.

column9: A Great Meal in the Center of Town
column11: We had a gathering for several people from all over the globe to celebrate the end of a life, a birthday and just getting together.  We couldn't have asked for a better place to eat and celebrate.  The staff were amazingly helpful and courteous.  We...More
Booked a table for three. Great service, lovely and clean and airy restaurant. Chose the chicken on skewers for starters and salmon for main. Delish!!!! Not cheap but nothing is in Sweden.

I visited this fabulous Thai restaurant on a recommendation. The menu is quite small but the food is exceptional. I believe the Satay to be the best I have ever had and the Pad Thai prawn was equally as good. The restaurant was full so...More
Nice and very welcoming restaurant in the heart of Lund. The food is very tasty with a modern twist. Good choice for the vegans as well.

column9: Great meal at a reasonable price with great service

Very cute and comfortable atmosphere. The food is top notch. Creative fusion food and good service. Highly recommend getting a reservation to make sure you get a table or come for early dinner.

column9: Nice meal at centre of Lund
column11: Come here for the lunch based on recommendation of a friend. Food is quite nice. Got their lunch menu of the day. Is nice and reasonable price. The decor of the place is very nice. Toilet also equip with baby pampers.... a bit suprise...

Excellent food. Fully booked all evenings so hard to get a reservation at dinnertime, but we went for lunch and it was great. The lunch menu is nice (esp the noodle bowls) and the Ã  la carte selection is even better. The sides are not...More
Me and my husband found this little restaurang to serve inventive and quality Asian dishes exactly to our taste, all in a very nice atmosphere.

Cooked with care and top produce!
Delicious. We had lunch; somewhat pricy but worth it! Don't miss mango sticky rice for desert!

column9: Struggled a Little With the Food.
column11:

The first thing to say is that the staff are friendly, enthusiastic and professional. I hadn't made...More

column9: Great spot for dinner in Lund
column11: We shared the chicken skewers and some summer rolls. The rolls were so good we ordered a second plate before our meal. I had the baby back ribs as recommended by our server. They were delicious. I wasnâ€™t expecting to find them in Sweden.
I was so surprised that food served here were so delicious! Service was great too, you got approval from us, two Asians who are experienced in tasting Thai food! Cheers!

Friday night. Students just starting to hit town. The oven is broken. So no Ribs and Prawline are off for the night.  No matter the spring rolls with prawns were delightful and the Duck was fab. Real highlight for me the meat lover was the...More
Cozy place, tasty food and friendly staff. It's one of my favorite place in town. Keep in mind that you need a reservation during weekend.

I have been to Ihsiri for lunch, but the visit really didn't disappoint me.
I took a bowl of noodles with steak entrecote and the meat was really nicely cooked and the noodles had a very fresh and balanced taste.

Modern Thai restaurant. Service is excellent. Prices average for Sweden. Need  too book. Cental location in Lund. Great food. Would recommend you try.

column9: Nice surprise with excellent Asian food
column11: An old one store building opposite Hotel Lundia. There wonton dish was fantastic! The chef really knows his job.
A very good place for Asian-European fusion food. Reasonable prices and very nice and helpful staff. Recommended.

Very nice place two mn from the cathedral. We had lunch outside. Ã€ salmon and a porc carrÃ© in Ã  thaÃ¯ version. Friendly personal and super clean toilets. An address recommended in the white guide (the Nordic foodies bible). Loved it.

column9: A tropical summer evening in Lund, framed the Asian meal perfect
column11: Even the temperature in the charming restaurant made you belief that we were in other latitudes. So liberating to eat at an Asian who is not over decorated with imported decorations.Lovely selection of tasty first courses, some own interpretations but still in its authentic flavor...More

Nicely furnished restaurant close to the main station. Came here because of the good reviews for a lunch. Small but delicious lunch menu. Very friendly and efficient service. No problem to bring in the baby stroller with our five month old son.

column9: Very tasty restaurant in the center of Lund

Fusion Thai at its best. I donâ€™t have negative to say about this restaurant. Slightly on the pricey side but portions are huge and tasty! Worth a visit.

A thai/asian restaurant conventiently located in central Lund. Excellent food, everyone in my company were satisified with their meal beyond doubt. Genuine taste, for those of you have eaten real thai food will appreciate the flashback.

Fantastic fusion food. High quality ingredience, inspired recepies and excellent service. All of this for reasonable prices. A rarity and gem in Sweden. Highly recommended.

Thai mixed with European cuisine, fresh ingredients, well balanced and innovative tastes to reasonable prices. Perfect service and delicious desserts to top things of. Right at the top of my future choices. Thanks

Yummy food with fresh, carefully crafted ingredients. Prices are fair and the staff is attentive and kind.
I had amazing dinner with my family last year. The service and tasted were both fabulous! Since then I go there even I am alone :) Can't forget the rib with peanut miso sauce.

One of, if not the best restaurant of its kind in Lund. Delicate, Asien-inspired food, good service, very priceworthy. The meny is kept relatively short but there is something for everybody.

Went as part of a birthday celebration, had booked the day before and luckily got the last table.

Fantastic thai food and good service! A family business at it's best. You would want to return over and over again.

column9: Exciting mix between Asian and Swedish food
column11: Very nice atmosphere. Good and friendly  service and excellent food, that mixes Asian  and European cooking. The lokation in an old house in central Lund, on a quiet street between the Central  station, the University building and the Cathedral, is excellent.
Very nice place with a plaseant backyard. Good food and non-alcoholic beverages is very interesting. Ice cream is a must- to- taste.

column9: Great lunch with good flavours a reasonable price
column11: We had a great lunch with family. There were four alternatives to choose (fish, pork, chicken and vegetarian). Very friendly service and good cosy atmosphere. If you like Asian food this is a place to visit.

The place was packed at 7 p.m. when we arrived and we had not reserved a table. However we went away and returned 45 minutes later and was able to receive a table then. The service was very friendly and the food was wonderful. We...More

Just across from the Hotel were we stayed we discovered this wonderful restaurant where great service and coffee refills are part of the deal. (To my partners great pleasure!)
Unfortunately we'd just eaten but the venue and menu looked so delicious and tempted us to...More
The food served at Ihsiri was superb. It's authentic Thai food with very nice presentation. The staff were attentive and friendly. It's worth our 1.5 hour drive:-) I highly recommend this place.

column9: Delicious Thai food and pleasant surroundings
column11: The food was very, very good and the restaurant clean, classy and cozy! I highly recommend it! The staff was also very nice.

Loved the food. Great quality ingredients and excellent prÃ¦sentation. The restaurant was full and we came without a reservation. We got lucky and there was a last minute cancellation. Great experience. Can highly recommend.
The first thing that impressed me is that my order didn't take a long time at all and above all, it was a tasty dish indeed.

column9: So so so so so good
column11: My favourite place to eat in Lund! Creative and (pleasantly) surprising food every time! A big plus for the vegan options, too. Also, the mango dessert is the best dessert I've ever had
The food here is simply delicious. The service is great, the portions are huge and the desserts are amazing.  It's a bit pricey, but definitely worth it!

column9: On a rainy Sunday this restaurant gave us our sunshine.

We did not have a lot of time so we just took Dish of the day, sitting in the backyard. Cosy, sunny, nice staff and good food. Fried pork with a salad and its Thai tastes. Perfect on a hot day!
Had lunch with the family here last year. They cater for babies with high chairs and change table (stocked with wipes and nappies). Food was very tasty. Dessert was also amazing.

column9: Nice lunch near the central station

Recommended!

Restaurant has a lovely style, friendly staff and great food. Perfect for business as well as private dinners. If you are in Lund, you should definitely go there

column9: One of the best in Lund

Amazing Thai food in the centre of Lund. Thai food with a twist of high class preparation - not an everyday combination.

This place is well worth a visit when in Lund. The Thai inspired food is delicious and the athmosphere is very much influenced by students. Very good service and not expensive.

The cuisine is Thai but the emphasis is also on fresh ingredients exquisitely prepared. The service is pleasant and attentive without being overbearing.
We had baby and spicy ribs as main dish. They were okay but nothing special. Consider visiting other places if you are thai cousine fan. No Wifi was available.

column9: Delicious food for all of us

column9: Very good Thai restaurant that also has a large selection of vegan alterantives

This restaurant is surprisingly good. We tried a variety of dishes and found that it was all either very good or excellent. Highly recommend if you like Asian or just enjoy a good meal. Very nice and friendly staff too made this an enjoyable experience.
My family and I enjoyed a really good dinner! The best asian food I have eaten since I don't know when! Great service and ambiance! Looking forward to come back again. :)

I was out with my girlfriends and we had a really good time. Nice wine, friendly service and delicious food. We had the summer rolls, always nice, and I had the steamed fish (sea-bass I think), and it was splendidly cooked.

The finest dining in Lund, to a good price! Every time I go there I get surprised by the beautiful and tasty food. The service and the surrounding is also perfect. I would reccomend this place for any occation.

column9: Asian Fusion - great taste but at a price

Nice and different food. Nice staff. Worth a visit if you are in Lund. Nice space. You maybe need to book a table to be sure to have a place.

column9: One of the best in Lund

Excellent service and child friendly.

column9: You must eat the Fish soup

column9: High in carbs and fat but keeps a fool hungry

column9: Best value for money in town

column9: A nice change from the usual sushi/thai
column11:

Their chili sauce is amazing! I always ask for extra... their coconut soup is refreshing

column9: Very good dumplings at a reasonable price

column9: GENUINE dumplings you can get in Lund.

column9: Finally an authentic Asian kitchen in Lund!
column11: Finally we have received an authentic Asian kitchen in Lund. This little "take-away/a few tables around" kitchen specializing in dumplings is a pure delight. column9: Jiao ze as it should taste like.

column9: The most authentic dumplings I have eaten in Sweden

column9: Good food, big eat for reasonable money
column11: I liked the dumplings - a variety. Free soup with the meal. Choce of rice or noodles. Inexpensive, but good.

column9: Antligen! Finally got to try this place

column9: Good food but not really Sichuan kitchen

This bakery stall in the Lund Market (Saluhall) is worth a visit!  The cardamom buns are delicious! It's just a counter, so you order and walk (like many places in the hall), but I go here every time I am in Lund.  

Most servers speak...More
A lot of food. Value for money. Average cost on friday and saturday 300kr. I would definitely recommend brunch.

column9: Very busy restaurant that charges for a glass of tap water
column11: This is clearly a very popular restaurant, that you possibly need to plan ahead to ensure you get a table, there is quite a decent buffet but is a vegetarian nightmare, only 1 dish on the menu or the salad bar. The food was actually...More

This is a fairly new place. They have a Very nice buffet where they make wooked food on order and also have a very nice selection of other food. Great for the family on a Sunday.

Nicely decorated Asian restaurant right in the heart of Lund. Friendly staff. Buffet definitely worth choosing especially for kids that want to experiment. Wide assortment of dishes. Kids definitely appreciated the self-serve ice cream machine. Definitely good value for money.

Lunch buffet is really recommendable.
Various salad, sushi, hot stirred , and so on.
Many tables, though, you will have to que!

I have been to a lot of Buffet restaurants, but this one is outstanding; Asian Buffet with Chinese, Thai dishes and Mongolian Barbecue. And the price is rather reasonable. They have so many dishes, so you hardly can taste everyone. The restaurant is beautifully decorated....More

This was a really nice surprise. I hadn't planned to eat at a 'foreign' restaurant while in Sweden. But this was a real treat! I opted for the buffet and there was a great choice of very good quality food.

Fantastic sushi, great Chinese dishes...More

Really nice buffet, fresh and inviting. Lots to choose from, ranging from sushi to mongolian barbecue. Everyone in the family (2 adults, 2 teenagers) could find something that they liked. The staff was a bit stressed and difficult to contact.
Some dishes are very nice like the pork meat and the chicken wing is always good. Some Chinese dishes are good depending on the menu. Sushi was fine. Always got too full for lunch there!

column9: Average food, high price and understaffed

Good food, great service. I like the place where it is, great to sit outside and just breathe in the good atmosphere and look at the old architecture this city has.

Rosegarden is growing in popularity in Lund. Every evening Fridays and Saturdays  and lunchtime. Be there in time so you can get your table. If I'm not mistaken can't book a table by telephone or website. Otherwise a perfect place to enjoy some good food....More

We had the evening buffet which I believe is the same food served lunchtime. Whilst the range is good and nicely presented, the autenticity and taste is a little mixed.

column9: Fresh, plenty, tasty food. Lunch - fair price. Dinner a tad expensive.
column11:

Incredible buffe -eat all you can- with fresh and tasty food. For me the best was the...More

And the swedish style is not a good thing when it comes to asian food.
The lunch is a common selection of deep and deeper fried stuff, noodles that are soaking in heavy sauces, some more deep fried chicken.
The sushi are served as well,...More
As folks say lunch buffet is a good deal. Weekend lunch is a bit more expensive but less crowded. Oily Asian food was good. Sushi was okay.

column9: Great food at a reasonable price!
column11:

I personally like the "Mongolia style" of food, where you pick up food...More

I do not understand what is the big fuzz around this place.

column9: Interesting alternative to the common buffet style asian restaurant

column9: An asian restaurant with an extra touch.

During lunches the buffet is rather cheap and really good food for your money. I think it is a bit over priced during the evenings.

..

column9: Great food for the buffet price

column9: Poor service at a high price

column9: Our favorite Greek restaurant in Lund
column11:
This restaurant is so cosy and romantic!
The staff is always nice and helpfull and the food i superb - and the location is good. Dining outside in the summering is absolutley recomended!

See you there ;)

A nice change from other options in town.  Staff was friendly, but a bit slow, and food was good.  

Dine outside if the weather accommodates.

column9: Large portions..... Not so great food
column11:
Went here for casual lunch outing in hope to try some Greek food. While not totally disappointed, was not impressed either. I took the Mediterranean Specialty while my partner took the Souvlaki kotopoulo. 
In the platter, the mousakka, tzaziki and fried potatoes were really good....More
Nice outdoor terrace where you can eat decent Greek dishes in large portions. Pretty inexpensive for Sweden too.

Went for a dinner with my vegan daughter an early Friday evening. The restaurant very popular so packed with guests - both inside and outside - but we managed to get a table for two. Despite busy hour very friendly and attentive service. We enjoyed...More
A Greek proprietor and a Greek chef provide as authentic and delicious experience as one could wish for - even to the glass of retsina (not compulsory!)
We had a good meal. Seats outside are a bit close too eachother. We had the moussaka and the mediterrean special. Good portion and good price also friendly staff

We didn't plan to eat Greek while in Sweden, but while wandering through Lund we just walked in and being both fans of Greek cuisine we decided to stay. The dishes were very good and portions ample - I wasn't able to finish mine and...More

I went to Mediterranean for celebrating my birthday. It was a fabulous experience  which satisfied me with great taste, nice ambience and prompt, friendly staff. 

I'd been to Greece last year and the food I ate in Athens and Santorini made me fan of Greek...More

Had a very good lunch - one had mousaka and one bifstek, both served with a small salad. Very good and fresh. And cheap as well. Service quick and friendly. Will be back.

column9: Friendly service, good honest Greek food

We had lunch here with the kids. The menu is very greek-oriented and everybody found something they liked. The food was good, not the best ever but very ok.
This place was very popular and after dining we understood why.  Good food, nice people.

column9: Fine Greek food in a cozy atmosphere

column9: Greeks really know how to cook
column11: You will never go out hungry from here - portions are generous and the variety numerous. Best is swordfish, squid, asnd lamb. Price is well worth the good food and service.

Good Greek food at very reasonable prices. The Greek wines are a good buy!

column9: Excellent value and open on a Sunday evening

column9: Classic greek food in a great setting
column11: This place has been around for a very long time, and for good reasons. The food is always good, and the staff are great. We visited for dinner, and had the owner stop by at our table to make sure we were enjoying dinner.

this place smells great and every year they do a whole roast lamb so I really wanted to go when we were celebrating my new job.

unfortunately I thought the food was very unimaginative. nothing vegetarian that seemed nice so I chose lamb which had...More

column9: Great Spot, Authentic Greek Food in Lund

column9: Not a must-eat place, but a fine meal.

The food is OK, not superb but you get some great Greek tzatziki if...More
The warm food is okay, but I would absolutely recommend the mixed starter plate! I've visited many times, the restaurant has a cosy atmosphere and the affordable Greek favourites.

The food here although quite basic (souvlaki, grilled lamb cutlets) was excellent. The service friendly and when I was stuck at the hotel with a migraine they even delivered. Absolutely worth a visit.

A nice restaurant with traditional greek food. An ambiance that takes you back to an small greek taverns. Very nice food and nice personal. Is a popular place, at the time we went there we didn't had a possibility to book a table so we...More

column9: An excellent choice for business dinner.

column9: Great service for a big group
column11:

column9: Nice Surprise  A little Greek In Lund

column9: Decently priced and good quality Sushi
column11:

Tip: Spend the small amount extra to try the Japanese white wine. It's worth it.

column9: Probably one of the best sushi places I have ever been to!
column11:

Would definitely recommend this place to anybody who happens to be in Lund!

column9: Onions and sushi should never meet...

column9: Worst sushi I've had in a long time.

I was desperate for some good Sunday evening type of food, and happened to find this by googling take away options in Lund. The more recent reviews here were encouraging to say the least, and I'm to report they were trustworthy. This is not the...More

column9: 4th visit in two months - great again!
column11:
I visited yesterday for the forth time in two months. The food is very consistent and high quality. This is the best Chinese food I have had in Sweden. It is really like you get it in China. The Sechuan dishes are still favourites.
I...More

Go here for excellent food, made the real chinese way - not the fake Euro-Chinese style (Four little courses, deep-fried banana....) Excellent and charming service. BUT, be aware that the tables and the rooms are very basic - and even a bit sticky. But that...More

column9: Fantastic "make over" on the food side!

I have been here now many times and I like just about anything from the menu.
Be aware when they put 2 chilis beside the meal it really! means that its hot:-)
It's not the usual european chinese stuff you always get, but some really...More
Mui Gong is for lovers of real Chinese food. You cannot find a better in Lund. Just a small entrance but the food coming out is great. Perfect for take away.

column9: Amazing Sichuan style fiery noodles that gives you a kick like no other chinese food outside of china!!!
column11: That is true! Some years ago this restaurant had a typical standard offering of sweet and sour swedish-chinese style dishes, but then something happened!!! When I tried it out recently I got a kick out of the food that I have not felt since I...More

column9: Real Chinese food, Best dandan noodle
column11: I am so glad to find a Chinese resturant in Lund which serves real Chinese food with good quality. Just to point out some highlights: their dumplings are amazing! I also strongly recommend their Chinese noodles, one is Dandan noodle and another is glass noodle....More

column9: Great dan dan noodles on the new menu
column11: tried the dan dan noodles on their new menu today very good! especially if you like spicy authentic sichaun flavours.this bowl of noodles will change your mind about chinese food in Lund!

Considering how expensive it is to eat in Sweden, this place is decent. I got the lunch buffet for 65kr. Decent and infinite coffee and tea. The place is clean and people are nice. Its fine for the price!

I ate the lunch buffet here and it was made up of mostly deep-fried stuff. The food felt really boring and low in quality.

The restaurant is small and not very fresh.
This used to be a nice chinese restaurant, a bit more upmarket than your usual "4 small dishes with rice" but unfortunately it isn't anymore.
If you want some good, fast Chinese food, this is as good as any that I've eaten in the U.S.  The prices were good (which is a shocker since Sweden is sooo expensive!!)  Clean, friendly workers.

column9: Quality served, fair price, real good China food.
column11:
We enjoyed:
Wanton soup
Dumplings, (Garlic and koriander)
Fungi Duck.

Friendly personnel, so we say:  
WE WILL BE BACK.

column9: Very good food, but a bit too small portions.
column11: Very good food, but a bit too small portions.

Cozy place for beer lovers and Austrian food. Spaces are crowded but not smoky, it's a warm place. Courtesy and smiles around make this a nice experience.

column9: Nice anniversary dinner on a rainy night

column9: Ambiance en masse and  germanic food
column11:

column9: Lots of fun and good food.

column11: This is a restaurant that many people miss altogether, even when they have lived in Lund for a long time. A solid set of repeat customers. Traditional Austrian food with lots of different beer. Very large portions with good quality at an affordable price.

column9: Slightly overpriced but nice food and ambience

column9: There is a burger for every soul

column9: Your nice no-fancy chineese restaurant in neighbourhood
column11:
Was at the Tatung restaurant multipe times, with colleagues. Great service, spacious restaurant and decent spread of menu!

The restaurant is willing to customize dishes a bit as per your wishes, which is great and not so common in this part of the world.

A nice restaurant with good tasty asian food near the train station in Lund. Many different dishes to choose from. They have lunch and a la carte with more expensive dishes. Free rice refills.
